subject: Free Agents (Sports)
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Donnie Walsh, the Knicks’ team president, has positioned the team to be a player in the free-agent market, regardless of whether LeBron James shows interest.
snippet: Donnie Walsh, the Knicks’ team president, has positioned the team to be a player in the free-agent market, regardless of whether LeBron James shows interest.
